Gaming With Purpose: Vineyard Gaming

February 12, 2024.Reading time 8 minutes.

It’s been a while since I added a post to this column, several years in fact! This time in Gaming With Purpose I’m highlighting a gaming community that is part of the Vineyard, a huge Christian movement around the world. Alex, one of their team members, reached out to me via email and I asked if […]

Gamer’s Journal: Who Is Samuru? My Username’s Origin Story

April 17, 2023.Reading time 6 minutes.

Dungeons & Dragons used to be huge but when I was growing up. I would visit my grandmother who lived in the middle of Manhattan during my summer or spring breaks from school. In most apartment buildings in NYC, some handymen live at the bottom floor called super (not sure why but that’s the title). […]
